description: {"blocks":[{"key":"frs4o","text":"The V-PLEX panel offers analytically validated multiplex assay kits. Developed under rigorous design control, V-PLEX kits provide accurate and reproducible results with consistency from lot to lot. The V-PLEX Proinflammatory Panel 1 (human) Kit includes ten biomarkers that are associated with the inflammatory response and immune system regulation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fk8jl","text":"Prepare calibrator dilutions","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bh40j","text":"a.    Prepare the highest calibrator (Calibrator 1) by adding 1000mL of Diluent 2 to the lyophilized calibrator vial. After reconstituting, invert at least 3 times. Let it equilibrate for 15-30 minutes at room temperature and then vortex briefly using short pulses.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7iot0","text":"b.    Prepare the next calibrator by transferring 100mL to the highest calibrator to 300mL of Diluent 2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fp9oa","text":"c.    Use Diluent 2 as the zero calibrator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7hto","text":"Prepare Detection Antibody Solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9tqmo","text":"For one plate, combine 2.400mL of Diluent 3 with:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbkaq","text":"-      60mL of SULFO-TAG Anti-hu IFN-γ Antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bp0e5","text":"-      60mL of SULFO-TAG Anti-hu IL-1b Antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55ssn","text":"-      60mL of SULFO-TAG Anti-hu IL-2 Antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ccc4","text":"-      60mL of SULFO-TAG Anti-hu IL-4 Antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"647pq","text":"-      60mL of SULFO-TAG Anti-hu IL-6 Antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"132s4","text":"-      60mL of SULFO-TAG Anti-hu IL-8 Antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5r0fe","text":"-      60mL of SULFO-TAG Anti-hu IL-10 Antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"befbp","text":"-      60mL of SULFO-TAG Anti-hu IL-12p70 Antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bbt7","text":"-      60mL of SULFO-TAG Anti-hu IL-13 Antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5i7er","text":"-      60mL of SULFO-TAG Anti-hu TNF-α Antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ei08j","text":"Prepare Wash Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6cili","text":"For one plate combine:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ktie","text":"- 15mL of MSD Wash Buffer (20X)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cho5h","text":"- 285mL of deionized water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2gve","text":"Prepare Read Buffer T","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8dkb","text":"For one plate combine:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11jsm","text":"- 10mL of Read Buffer T (4X)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64p93","text":"- 10mL of deionized water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bas4k","text":"Wash and Add Sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"am52n","text":"a.    Wash the plate 3 times with at least 150mL/well of Wash Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d3uia","text":"b.    Add 50uL of prepared samples, calibrators, or controls per well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hgrp","text":"c.    Seal the plate with an adhesive plate seal.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"agf8m","text":"d.    Incubate at room temperature with shaking for 2h.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cunu2","text":"Wash and Add Detection Antibody Solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckd2g","text":"a.    Wash the plate 3 times with at least 150mL/well of Wash Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1iap","text":"b.    Add 25uL of detection antibody solution to each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ccld0","text":"c.    Seal the plate with an adhesive plate seal.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"boe91","text":"d.    Incubate at room temperature with shaking for 2h.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"801ol","text":"Wash and Read","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hd1a","text":"a.    Wash the plate 3 times with at least 150mL/well of Wash Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qrmh","text":"b.    Add 150uL of 2X Read Buffer T to each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ec12","text":"c.    Seal the plate with an adhesive plate seal.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"al9np","text":"d.    Analyze the plate on an MSD instrument.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: MSD V-PLEX Proinflammatory panel
